creator: jacarlso@katun.com
text:
The links on the Help browser either don't work or cause you to jump to the 
wrong place on the page.

Also encountered this problem.
Platform:Sun, OS:Solaris, Ver:1.8 JDK:1.3.1

select help menu > Help
Help window has contents on left, chapter 13 on right lots of links, none work.
creator: rob.say@sun.com
mstover1@apache.org
text:
The Help system is partially dependent on JDK1.4.  It works for me on Windows,
the only problem being that the very first time I click "Help", it doesn't
scroll me to the right place.  Thereafter, works perfect.  

Any ideas from others?

creator: mstover1@apache.org
text:
I'm marking as fixed, cause I just fixed the one problem I mentioned.  If it
doesn't scroll right, it is likely

1.  A Platform-specific issue
2. Not all elements are in the component reference page currently.  If you ask
for help on one of those, it won't scroll anywhere.
3. A JDK version  issue.
